WorkItem.ClosedComment: by default most providers has set MaxZoom = 17; you can increase it
WorkItem.Description:
Hi there,
First i like to Thank radioman for great article.

After that i like to report one bug (if it is).
In windows forms:
When i put ServerOnly it allow me to zoom more then 17 - Work fine.
(ofcourse i set maxzoom to some value grater then 17)
And if in application change map provider or to ServerAndCash, CashOnly, or change map provider, and again set maxzoom level to some value, it work but to zoom level of 17. 
max zoom level is fixed!
And if i get back ServerOnly it also fixed to 17.
